snippet: Two state troopers who were deployed in Iraq are using their counterinsurgency training for a program to combat drug and gang violence back home.
abstract: Michael Cutone and Thomas Sarrouf, two state troopers who were deployed in Iraq, use their counterinsurgency training in a community program to combat drug and gang violence back in their home city of Springfield, Mass; residents' response has been mixed.
lead_paragraph: Two state troopers who were deployed in Iraq are using their counterinsurgency training for a program to combat drug and gang violence back home.

headline.seo: Springfield, Mass., Fights Crime Using Green Beret Tactics
headline.main: With Green Beret Tactics, Combating Gang Warfare
headline.print_headline: Combating Gang Warfare With Green Beret Tactics

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
